$Log$ Revision 1.10 2011/11/03 21:47:38 zhengc Extract certs.tar file should only be done on vm-containers and compute nodes. The post-51-gfarm-certificates file may not be effective, since the certs.tar file will only exist after 411 sync it from frontend. But it's harmless to do.
Revision 1.9 2011/11/02 22:41:56 zhengc Removed common cron entrie, restored seperate cron entries for server and client. This is based on frontend with public network interface and vm-containers/compute-nodes may only have private network interface. VDT on frontend setup cron jobs to auto-update certificates and CRLs from external source. vm-containers/compute-nodes is setup to synchronize with frontend. Also, minor cleanup to AvailableIP file.
Revision 1.8 2011/10/07 19:12:20 phil Slight graph re-arrangement. Add a common file to reduce code redundancy.
Revision 1.7 2011/09/19 20:00:17 zhengc Add vm-deploy scripts

mkdir /etc/grid-security crontab -l > /var/tmp/cron.out echo "00 02 * * * cd /; /bin/tar xf /etc/grid-security/certs.tar" >> /var/tmp/cron.out crontab /var/tmp/cron.out rm /var/tmp/cron.out
#!/bin/sh cd / /bin/tar xf /etc/grid-security/certs.tar rm /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-51-gfarm-certificates
